title: Interactive Portfolio
body: I made this app for my sister and the focus was on providing a good UI for an easy customization, Minimal Design, Easy To Browse, Blog Customizable (Create, Read, Update, Delete) and Dark Mode.

title: Travel Agency App
description: Carpe Mundi, is a travel agency app project
body: On the app you will be able to tailor your journey to your preferences. Exclude destinations or upgrade your stay to a top-tier hotel. It's all about enjoying a unique experience on your terms. You decide if you want your destination to be a surprise. Two days before your outbound flight, we'll reveal the destination and accommodation via email. No need to plan; the countdown begins! With no expectations, travel to a destination waiting to be discovered. It's that simple! Embrace every second of your trip without worries. This is a final project made for 4geeks Academy Click on View Site to see a live presentation of the app.

title: Star Wars Blog
description: Data Bank of Star Wars Information
body: Star Wars Blog made possible with the SWAPI API as a project for 4geeks Academy, here you will be able to see all the specifications of your favorites Star Wars Characters, Spaceships and Planets.

title: Landing App
description: Creating Ties, Student Travel and Service Learning Programs
body: This is a Landing Page made for a teacher that plans Student Travel and Service Learning Programs seeking to foster cultural connections through transformative journeys.
